transArray.content: Everything is good and clean. Breakfast is also great.

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! Our hotel is located in the East Fourth Ring Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing. It has an excellent geographical location and convenient transportation. There are many prosperous business districts around it, especially close to Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, Joy City, Sanlitun and other business districts. They are all very close and within walking distance, which is extremely convenient. The hotel also has self-service washing machines, dryers and delivery robots to facilitate your travel. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
